properties.areaDesc: Wabash, IL; Knox, IN; Gibson, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 11:49AM EST until January 8 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

East Fork White River...White River...

.Precipitation on Sunday and Monday have led to minor flooding conditions
along some points of the East Fork White...and White Rivers.
Significant flooding is not expected.

The Flood Warning continues for
The White River at Hazleton.
* until Wednesday morning.
* There have been no observations in the last 24 hours.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It is forecast to crest at 17.5 feet Sunday evening and
will fall below flood stage by Tuesday evening.
* At 17.5 feet...Flood water is near or starting on Pottsville Road.
Low bottomlands are increasingly affected by flood waters.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
